name: Twin Robots
description: Twin Robots is a 2.5D platformer where you can switch control between two little robots; They have been imprisoned and need to find the way out of each level! You can play alone or with a friend in local co-op multiplayer, so that each player controls one robot. The game can be played along its 28 levels alone or in cooperative mode with a friend thanks to his split screen gameplay. Features: Strategy thinking: Manage your energy levels through the level so that you can safely reach the exit and charge the last door to open it. Puzzle solving: Some levels require both robots to help eachother in order to solve easy puzzles. TV Border: You can adjust the TV border so the game fits your TV completely. Local co-op: You can have some multiplayer action!
